{{cpp/io/basic_ostream/title | tellp}}
{{cpp/io/basic_ostream/navbar}}
{{ddcl |
pos_type tellp();
}}

Returns the output position indicator of the current associated {{tt|streambuf}} object.

{{rev begin}}
{{rev | since=c++11 |
Behaves as {{named req|UnformattedOutputFunction}} (except without actually performing output). After constructing and checking the sentry object, 
}}
{{rev end}}
If {{c|1=fail()==true}}, returns {{c|pos_type(-1)}}. Otherwise, returns {{c|rdbuf()-&gt;pubseekoff(0, std::ios_base::cur, std::ios_base::out)}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
current output position indicator on success, {{c|pos_type(-1)}} if a failure occurs.

===Example===
{{example
 | code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;sstream&gt;
int main()
{
    std::ostringstream s;
    std::cout &lt;&lt; s.tellp() &lt;&lt; '\n';
    s &lt;&lt; 'h';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; s.tellp() &lt;&lt; '\n';
    s &lt;&lt; "ello, world ";
    std::cout &lt;&lt; s.tellp() &lt;&lt; '\n';
    s &lt;&lt; 3.14 &lt;&lt; '\n';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; s.tellp() &lt;&lt; '\n' &lt;&lt; s.str();
}
 | output=
0
1
13
18
hello, world 3.14
}}
